means: 重要（性）( consequence的名词复数 )

sentence.Network_en: If climate changes continue, we will suffer the consequences.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果气候变化继续下去，我们将自食其果。

sentence.Network_en: I believe I am capable of calculating the political consequences accurately.
sentence.Network_cn: 我觉得我能准确预料此事的政治后果。

sentence.Network_en: The consequences of the counter-revolution have been extremely bloody.
sentence.Network_cn: 反革命的结果是十分血腥的。

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...所以解决方案并不描述一个特定而具体的设计或实现，而是提供设计问题的抽象描述和怎样用一个具有一般意义的元素组合(类或对象组合)来解决这个问题。效果(consequences)描述了模式应用的效果及使用模式应权衡的问题。尽管我们描述设计决策时.

whoever illegally uses special monitoring or photographing equipment and causes grave consequences is to be sentenced to not more than two years of fixed-term imprisonment , criminal detention , or control .非法使用窃听、窃照专用器材，造成严重后果的，处二年以下有期徒刑、拘役或者管制。
He felt weight of the consequences of his decisions falling on his shoulders ., 他感到他所做的决定的严重后果已经压在肩上了.
Fear of the consequences preyed on her mind ., 她担心其后果而惴惴不安.

consequent ridge 顺向山脊consequent valley 顺向谷consequent 继起的

entry.def: The consequences of something are the results or effects of it.

example.ex: Her lawyer said she understood the consequences of her actions and was prepared to go to jail...
example.tran: 她的律师说她明白自己行为的后果，已有了入狱的心理准备。

example.ex: An economic crisis may have tremendous consequences for our global security.
example.tran: 一场经济危机可能严重影响到全球安定。

entry.def: If one thing happens and then another thing happens in consequence or as a consequence, the second thing happens as a result of the first.

example.ex: His death was totally unexpected and, in consequence, no plans had been made for his replacement...
example.tran: 他的死完全出乎意料，所以，根本没有安排替补人选。

example.ex: Maternity services were to be reduced in consequence of falling birth rates.
example.tran: 由于出生率下降，产科服务会随之削减。

entry.def: Something or someone of consequence is important or valuable. If something or someone is of no consequence, or of little consequence, they are not important or valuable.

example.ex: As an overseer, he suddenly found himself a person of consequence...
example.tran: 作为工头，他突然觉得自己是个重要人物。

example.ex: Where he is from is of no consequence to me.
example.tran: 他来自何方对我来说并不重要。

entry.def: If you tell someone that they must take the consequences or face the consequences, you warn them that something unpleasant will happen to them if they do not stop behaving in a particular way.

example.ex: These pilots must now face the consequences of their actions and be brought to trial...
example.tran: 这些飞行员现在必须为自己的行为承担后果，接受审判。

example.ex: If climate changes continue, we will suffer the consequences.
example.tran: 如果气候变化继续下去，我们将自食其果。

auth_sentence.content: The change could have catastrophic consequences for marine life.
auth_sentence.res_content: The change could have catastrophic consequences for marine life.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The change could have catastrophic consequences for marine life.

auth_sentence.content: The world is warming and there will be consequences.
auth_sentence.res_content: The world is warming and there will be consequences.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The world is warming and there will be consequences.

auth_sentence.content: The consequences of this attitude are all around us.
auth_sentence.res_content: The consequences of this attitude are all around us.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The consequences of this attitude are all around us.

Sentence.sentence: The consequences of getting caught are serious and may include a "O" on a test or assignment, an "F" in the class, suspension (暂令停学) or dismissal from school and a ruined reputation.
Eventually, the cheater gets caught, and the later he/she gets caught, the worse the consequences
"Make your own way"," Stand on your own two feet" or my mother's favorite remark when I was face-to-face with consequences of some action: Now that you've made your bed, lie on it.
To date, the US has seemed unable to see the consequences of spending so much more than is taken in.
The third rule is to be ready to cite options and consequences.
The boss's suggestions might be appropriate, but there are always consequences
